accountDetails.title: Complete your account details
accountDetails.description: If we need to contact you about your account, we'll use these details
accountDetails.name: Full name

agentRegister.title: Do you want to register as an agent?
agentRegister.description: If you want to represent another business (either as a professional surveyor, an accountant, friend, or relative), we will give you a unique agent code. You will need to give this code to that business so they can appoint you to speak for them.

accommodationNumber.title: How many visitor accommodations do you want to register?
accommodationNumber.description: You'll need to declare each visitor accommodation separately if:

signIn.title: Sign in
signIn.description: Please enter your login details. If you have forgotten your password, please select the 'Forgot Password' button.

accommodationOperator.title: Are you the operator for these visitor accommodations?
accommodationOperator.description: An operator is the person who enters into the accommodation supply contract with a Visitor.
accommodationOperator.description2: If you select yes, we'll use your account details to pre-populate some of this information.

accommodationContact.title: Will you be the authorised contact for these visitor accommodations
accommodationContact.description: An authorised contact is the person we contact for questions about the visitor accommodation
accommodationContact.description2: If you select yes, we will use your account details to pre-populate some of this information.
